name: Monthly Dragon Oracle
description:
Controls: z button and arrow keys

(Don't be alarmed that there's no music. I haven't quite figured that element out yet)

///

Have you ever wondered what the universe has planned for you?

Well, the dragon that lives deep within a mysterious forest has some answers for you. Although.....they may not be the ones you were hoping for....

///

This is an incredibly short little game that sprung from my personal frustration trying to make words...work. My notebook was full of silly scribbles and doodles and just the other day the thought hit me: what if I make something fun out of it? 

And this was incredibly fun to make over the weekend! There's 30 unique answers The Great Dragon Oracle can give you. It's all randomized so it really is up to fate.

My plan currently is to make another one each month (and hopefully I'll manage my time and add more characters, and better art). 

Have a good day and enjoy!

///

If there's any issues &/ if it doesn't cycle back to the original screen in the end, please let me know and which fortune you received that time.
